author: Special Correspondent
text:
Bharat Sanchar Nigam Limited, in collaboration with Tamil Nadu Skill Development Corporation (TNSDC), offers a free job-oriented training programme for unemployed youths on cell phone servicing.

An official statement said that those who had completed SSLC and above could apply for this five-day training programme.

Certificates would be issued to the trainees at the end of the training. The first batch of the training started on January 18, and four batches had undergone training so far.

Interested candidates could register their names online using the link http://rgmttc.bsnl.co.in/jobportal. The candidates should attend an interview to be held at office of the General Manager, Vannarpettai, Tirunelveli, at 9 a.m. on February 22.

The candidates should bring three sets of filled-in registration forms, photo copies of educational qualification, community certificate, identity proof and residential proof along with five recent passport size photographs, the statement added.
title: Free job-oriented training
